South Africa needed to beat the Netherlands to secure their spot in the semi-finals but failed.
South Africa was eliminated from the World Cup despite being undefeated after three games.
Netherlands now qualify for the 2024 T20 World Cup. No qualifiers for the Dutch.
South Africa's loss means India tops Group 2 and advances to the semi-finals.
The winner of the Pakistan-Bangladesh game will finish second in Group 2 and take on Group 1 winners New Zealand in the semi-finals.
The result left Bangladesh and Pakistan fighting for the final spot in the last four.
India topped the group and played Zimbabwe in the final match of the day to decide the final Super 12 standings.
This T20 World Cup marks the end of Ryan Campbell's stint as the head coach of Netherlands.
South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was played at the Adelaide Oval.
The Adelaide pitch was two-paced and offered some grip, which Glover utilized effectively.
The Adelaide surface continued to get slower.
South Africa's fate was sealed just after dawn back home in South Africa.
The match took place on a sun-washed Sunday morning in Adelaide.
South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was televised on Star Sports Network in India.
South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was streamed live on Disney+ Hotstar.
